```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("../../"))
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```

# Import data

```{r import}
pilot <- read_csv("./perceptual-pilot/experiment/data/f001_perceptual-pilot_2018_Jan_11_1419.csv") %>%
    mutate_if(is.character, as.factor)
```

# Explore

```{r}
pilot %>%
    filter(!is.na(key_resp_2.keys), condition == "burst") %>%
    ggplot(aes(burst, as.numeric(key_resp_2.keys))) +
#    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```

```{r}
pilot %>%
    filter(!is.na(key_resp_2.keys), condition == "voicing") %>%
    ggplot(aes(voicing, as.numeric(key_resp_2.keys))) +
#    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```
